contents.content: I pursued B.TECH from department of Food Process Engineering, National Institute of Technology, Rourkela.

I have 1+ years of experience of building websites and front-end applications with major as JavaScript. Being fascinated towards software and websites from my early age, I started practicing web development in my 2nd year of college, and I'm able to see this beautiful world of web.
Currently working as a Software Developer at Hashedin by deloitte, builds deep tech SAAS products and platforms.

software:

projects.title: Spotiffy
projects.subTitle: A clone of Spotify Web App
projects.techStack: ReactJs, Hooks (as State Management), HTML and CSS, Spotify Web API
projects.contents:
• A Clone of Spotify Web App, created by using Spotify Web API and Web Playback SDK.
• Features: User details, Search, Your Library, Playback Player and its controls (requires Premium account).

projects.title: News In Seconds
projects.subTitle: An online News-paper with modern Instagram layout
projects.techStack: NodeJs, AWS Lambda, ReactJs, Hooks (as State Management), S3 Bucket, HTML, CSS
projects.contents: • A News website, created to provide Local, National and International news in both Hindi and English Language. • Given management access with Admin, SuperAdmin or User through Auth0 services.
